img.alt: Finalist Recognition for Elmont Memorial Student

a.span: Finalist Recognition for Elmont Memorial Student

div.p: Elmont Memorial High School is proud to announce that Marvia Pressoir has been named a New York State International Science & Engineering Fair finalist.

a.title: Go to comments for Finalist Recognition for Elmont Memorial Student

img.alt: Short Story and Poetry Contest Winners

a.span: Short Story and Poetry Contest Winners

div.p: Congratulations to Floral Park Memorial High School students Ashwin Ghera and Jack Ratajczak, who received first place on the district-level in the Junior Women’s Club of Bellerose Short Story and Poetry Contest. Their entries are currently being judged at the regional level.

a.title: Go to comments for Short Story and Poetry Contest Winners

img.alt: NYS Gymnastics Championship

div.p: Congratulations to Brianna Evelyn, a senior at New Hyde Park Memorial High School, who represented the district’s varsity gymnastics team at the NYS Gymnastics Championship Meet on Feb. 29 at Cold Spring Harbor High School.

a.title: Go to comments for NYS Gymnastics Championship

img.alt: New Hyde Park Memorial Students Volunteer

a.span: New Hyde Park Memorial Students Volunteer

div.p: On Feb. 18, during the winter break, eleven members of the Business Honor Society at New Hyde Park Memorial High School spent the day at the Mary Brennan Shelter in Hempstead.

a.title: Go to comments for New Hyde Park Memorial Students Volunteer

img.alt: District Recognizes Outstanding Students and Staff

a.span: District Recognizes Outstanding Students and Staff

div.p: The Board of Education recognized the valedictorians and salutatorians from across the district, as well as the board of education president, energy efficient students at H. Frank Carey High School, Coca-Cola Scholar semifinalists and a National Board-Certified Teacher, at its meeting on Feb. 25.

a.title: Go to comments for District Recognizes Outstanding Students and Staff

img.alt: Cosmetology Students Work with Hair We Share

a.span: Cosmetology Students Work with Hair We Share

div.p: District cosmetology junior and senior classes at Sewanhaka High School recently worked with Suzanne Chimera, the founder of Hair We Share.

a.title: Go to comments for Cosmetology Students Work with Hair We Share

img.alt: Carey Celebrates P.S. I Love You Day

a.span: Carey Celebrates P.S. I Love You Day

div.p: Students and staff at H. Frank Carey High School celebrated P.S. I Love You Day for the second consecutive year on Feb. 14. The mission of this important day, which is held every year on the second Friday of February, is to inspire mental health awareness and decrease bullying.

a.title: Go to comments for Carey Celebrates P.S. I Love You Day

img.alt: New Hyde Park Memorial Student recognized for Artwork

a.span: New Hyde Park Memorial Student recognized for Artwork

div.p: New Hyde Park Memorial High School art student Katie Gutierrez received an Award of Excellence for her work showcased in the Art League of Long Island's "Go APE" exhibit, which is now in its 13th year.

a.title: Go to comments for New Hyde Park Memorial Student recognized for Artwork
